data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Vaishali to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vaishali, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Vaishali prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Vaishali, Bihar, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Vaishali, Bihar, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 3,495,000 people living in Vaishali through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Vaishali, Bihar, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the county of Vaishali, Bihar, India has a population of 3,495,000.

We estimate Vaishali has 38,445 people who might know Jesus, 42,406 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,414,149 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Vaishali. Through your servants plant 699 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
